text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a1b9b0cc011ef15869ac25cb93e1b4baa0cb7f38|patch 8.2.1406: popupwindow lacks scrollbar if no "maxheight" is used>
patch 8.2.1406: popupwindow lacks scrollbar if no "maxheight" is used

Problem:    Popupwindow lacks scrollbar if no "maxheight" is used.
Solution:   Compute the max height depending on the position. (closes #6664)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1406: popupwindow lacks scrollbar if no "maxheight" is used · vim/vim@a1b9b0c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1406: popupwindow lacks scrollbar if no "maxheight" is used · vim/vim@a1b9b0c
attachments.text: Problem: Popupwindow lacks scrollbar if no "maxheight" is used. Solution: Compute the max height depending on the position. (closes #6664)

patch 8.2.1405: Vim9: vim9compile.c is getting too big

Solution:   Split off type code to vim9type.c.

patch 8.2.1404: Vim9: script test fails in the GUI

Solution:   Use another key to map.  Improve cleanup.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3896a105eb3697b1a399255ac31c742c8840bd69|patch 8.2.1403: Vim9: Vim highlighting may fail in cmdline window>
patch 8.2.1403: Vim9: Vim highlighting may fail in cmdline window

Problem:    Vim9: Vim highlighting fails in cmdline window if it uses Vim9
            commands.
Solution:   Allow using :vim9script, :import and :export while in the cmdline
            window. (closes #6656)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/62a232506d06f6d1b3b7271801c907d6294dfe84|patch 8.2.1401: cannot jump to the last used tabpage>
patch 8.2.1401: cannot jump to the last used tabpage

Problem:    Cannot jump to the last used tabpage.
Solution:   Add g and tabpagnr('#'). (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6661,
            neovim #11626)

patch 8.2.1400: Vim9: test does not delete written files

Solution:   Correct file names.

text:

patch 8.2.1399: Vim9: may find imported item in wrong script

Problem:    Vim9: may find imported item in wrong script.
Solution:   When looking up script-local function use the embedded script ID.
            (issue #6644)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1399: Vim9: may find imported item in wrong script · vim/vim@efa9444
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1399: Vim9: may find imported item in wrong script · vim/vim@efa9444
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: may find imported item in wrong script. Solution: When looking up script-local function use the embedded script ID. (issue #6644)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/daa2f36573db3e1df7eb1fdbc3a09a2815644048|patch 8.2.1398: autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly>
patch 8.2.1398: autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly

Problem:    Autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly.
Solution:   Do not source an autoload script again. (issue #6644)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1398: autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly · vim/vim@daa2f36
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1398: autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly · vim/vim@daa2f36
attachments.text: Problem: Autoload script sourced twice if sourced directly. Solution: Do not source an autoload script again. (issue #6644)

patch 8.2.1397: Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth arg

Problem:    Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth argument.
Solution:   Check if fourth argument is present. (closes #6645)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1397: Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth… · vim/vim@4a6d1b6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1397: Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth… · vim/vim@4a6d1b6
attachments.text: … arg Problem: Vim9: return type of maparg() not adjusted for fourth argument. Solution: Check if fourth argument is present. (closes #6645)
